Package seng201_project

Interface GameEnviromentUi

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandLine, Gui
public interface GameEnviromentUi
Defines a user interface (UI)for a GameEnvironment class

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String INPUT_REGEX
    A regular expression for validating an input number against the input requirements if the player want to buy or sell goods
    static java.lang.String INPUT_REQUIREMENTS
    A description of the input requirements if the player want to buy or sell goods
    static java.lang.String NAME_REGEX
    A regular expression for validating a name against the name requirements
    static java.lang.String NAME_REQUIREMENTS
    A description of the name requirements for the player

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void enterMain()
    Start the UI and displays the options that player can choose The actions are: 1.
    void enterStore​(Store store)
    Start the UI and display store specification
    void gameOver​(java.lang.String reason)
    Start the UI which displays the information that the game is over, the reason, the total profit, the traveling days, and the score
    void loading()
    Start the UI and display loading
    void meetRandomEvent​(java.lang.String event)
    Start the UI and display information about the random event that player meet
    void payCrew()
    Display pop up message that the crews have been paid by the player
    void playRockPaperScissor()
    Start the UI and make player plays rock paper scissor game
    void playRollingADie()
    Start the UI and make player plays rolling a die game
    void seeIsland​(Island island)
    See the chosen island specification
    void seeRoute()
    Start the UI which displays the specification about the Route
    void seeShip()
    Start the UI which display the selected ship specification
    void seeSoldItem()
    Start the UI which shows the information about the goods that has been sold
    void setupAdventure()
    Start the UI and manage their selected days and ship
    void setupName​(GameEnvironment game)
    Initializes the UI and sets up the given Game Environment It also asks the player to input his name Once setup name is complete UI must call GameEnvironment#setName(String user name)
    void tellPlayer​(java.lang.String string)
    Displays a message to the UI

  • Method Details

    • setupName

      void setupName​(GameEnvironment game)
      Initializes the UI and sets up the given Game Environment It also asks the player to input his name Once setup name is complete UI must call GameEnvironment#setName(String user name)
      Parameters:
      game - The GameEnvironment that this UI interacts with

    • setupAdventure

      void setupAdventure()
      Start the UI and manage their selected days and ship

    • enterStore

      void enterStore​(Store store)
      Start the UI and display store specification
      Parameters:
      store - the store at the current location that the player want to visit

    • seeIsland

      void seeIsland​(Island island)
      See the chosen island specification
      Parameters:
      island - The island which the player want to see

    • seeShip

      void seeShip()
      Start the UI which display the selected ship specification

    • seeRoute

      void seeRoute()
      Start the UI which displays the specification about the Route

    • payCrew

      void payCrew()
      Display pop up message that the crews have been paid by the player

    • loading

      void loading()
      Start the UI and display loading

    • meetRandomEvent

      void meetRandomEvent​(java.lang.String event)
      Start the UI and display information about the random event that player meet
      Parameters:
      event - The random event that the player meet

    • seeSoldItem

      void seeSoldItem()
      Start the UI which shows the information about the goods that has been sold

    • gameOver

      void gameOver​(java.lang.String reason)
      Start the UI which displays the information that the game is over, the reason, the total profit, the traveling days, and the score
      Parameters:
      reason - a String tells the reason why the game is ended

    • enterMain

      void enterMain()
      Start the UI and displays the options that player can choose The actions are: 1. Go to store at current location 2. See Ship Specification 3. Sail to another island 4. End the game

    • playRockPaperScissor

      void playRockPaperScissor()
      Start the UI and make player plays rock paper scissor game

    • playRollingADie

      void playRollingADie()
      Start the UI and make player plays rolling a die game

    • tellPlayer

      void tellPlayer​(java.lang.String string)
      Displays a message to the UI
      Parameters:
      string - the message that shown to the player
